message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $140?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $140 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $160?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I would like to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $150 for the product?
